featured_prop.Directions: Bob Hope to Clancy Lane
featured_prop.Remarks: Magnificent estate compound with over three acres of park like grounds on prestigious Clancy Lane! Six bedrooms, seven and a half baths including guest wing and guest house. Approx. 10,495 sq. ft. Features elegant stone entry bridge over water, living room with marble two sided fireplace to dining room and custom marble sit down wet bar. Gourmet kitchen with center prep/cook island and family room with fireplace, media and breakfast nook. The guest wing has a living room with fireplace, full kitchen and laundry. Guest house has game room and wet bar. Master suite is fit for a king with marble fireplace, media and his and her baths. Resort like pool with large spa, waterfalls and swim up bar. Three hole putting green, sunken tennis court with lights and seating terrace. Every amenity and sensational mountain views! Furnishings are negotiable! Available for lease, call listing agent for more information.

featured_prop.Directions: Inside gate immediate right, home is on your left.
featured_prop.Remarks: Unique Old World Charm, the open floor plan offering indoor/outdoor living at its best! The woodwork in this home is a show stopper, beautiful French doors throughout home,a true Chefs kitchen offers a La Cornue range and hood. Courtyard offers water features, bridge to view the beautiful english garden. Master suite is a private oasis. private hot tub, outdoor shower, stunning views. Garage offer 3 car plus golf cart, high end built-in cabinets with pull-outs, complete dog grooming station. Wine cellar has hand painted art on walls, extra large laundry room with full sewing station. Open balcony overlooking living room offers a wall to wall library, office with stone fireplace. Outdoor BBQ area with large stone island, sink, stone fireplace, flat screen TV, pool is 10 feet deep.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Hwy 74 south to Bighorn gate (on right)
featured_prop.MiscString4: Golf Course View,Lake View,Mountain View,Panoramic View
featured_prop.Remarks: Masterpiece at Bighorn! 4 BR, 5.5 BA incl. guest house + office. Approx. 8,608 sq. ft. on .72 acre lot. Award winning home by Gordon Stein features jaw dropping views from virtually every main room. Paved motor court to gated courtyard with custom fountain. Gallery style entry to great room with fireplace and custom granite bar. Formal dining room with hand painted coffered ceiling & custom buffets. Gourmet kitchen with center island, counter bar, morning room & butlers pantry. Family room with fireplace and media center opens to entertainment patio. Master suite with fireplace and sitting area has spa inspired bath with fireplace and massage center. Detached guest house has family room with media, morning room & kitchenette. Outdoor living room, fireplace and BBQ center with bar. Custom pool with waterfalls & raised spa. Premium double lot overlooking lake and the 6th fairway of the Mountain course! Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: The ultimate estate at Hideaway Golf Club! Five bedrooms, five baths plus two powder rooms. Approx. 6,890 sq. ft. on half acre lot. Features gated courtyard entry with area for entertaining including fireplace and media. Towering rotunda foyer, great room with fireplace and step down wet bar. Formal dining with fireplace and beautiful wine room. Gourmet kitchen with large island / counter bar, top of the line appliances and walk in pantry. Elegant master retreat with fireplace and his and her bath. Four beautiful guest suites, high tech office and fantastic game room with wet bar and view terrace. Pocket doors open to both front and back outdoor entertainment areas. The loggia has fireplace, media and outdoor kitchen. Custom pool and spa, fire pit and elevated southwest views of lake, mountains and the 17th green of the Clive Clark course. Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Spectacular Estate home at the Hideaway Golf Club. 4 BR, 4 BA plus 2 powder rooms, 3 guest bedrooms, one with fireplace, plus an executives office overlooking the majestic mountains. Approx. 6,257 sq. ft. on .47 acre lot. Features beautiful stone courtyard entry with waterfalls. Spectacular Great room with grand stone fireplace and sit down wet bar. Formal dining room with reclaimed wood beam ceilings. Gourmet kitchen with gorgeous stone hearth and custom center island and morning room. Master suite with fireplace and master bath fit for a queen. Unbelievable custom stonework, custom woodwork, & custom window finishes. Pocket doors open to fabulous outdoor living area with stone fireplace, custom pool with stone built water falls, ponds and raised spa. Perfect west facing mountain and golf course views on the 17th of the Clive Clark course. Interior design and furnishings by exclusive Fedderly and Associates.

featured_prop.Interior: Pantry,Cathedral-Vaulted Ceilings,Kitchen Open to Family Room,High Ceilings (9 Feet+)
featured_prop.Laundry: Dryer Included,Gas Dryer Hookup,Washer Included,Individual Room
featured_prop.Remarks: Arguably the finest in design, engineering, details, finishes and view siting of any New-Century Palm Springs home. Taking cues from the masters of mid-century modern design, Ana Escalante, AIA utilized and updated the hallmarks of block, wood, steel, glass and stone to create this architecturally significant, one-off masterpiece. Published multiple times locally, nationwide and internationally, this home provides both open, flowing spaces, while at the same time offers total privacy behind gates. The main house contains a master suite which is its own glass pod floating over the property and offers dual baths, room-sized closets and outdoor spa. Two ensuite guest rooms plus a powder room complement the living/dining/bar & kitchen/family areas. The guest house mimics the architectural theme with 2 ensuites, open/closed salon & wet bar. The arc of the pool leads your eyes to the City lights hundreds of feet below. Four climate controlled garages radiate off the circular driveway.

featured_prop.Directions: Highway 111 to Thunderbird Road which goes in to Thunderbird Heights. Right on Placerville
featured_prop.Remarks: Thunderbird Heights Paradise! This luxurious 5 BR/5&1/2BA home has been beautifully remodeled in 2011. This retreat has contemporary finishes, with A Rudin and Holly Hunt furnishings.The gourmet kitchen features very high end appliances and Caesar Stone countertops. The master suite, which occupies the West side, has a luxurious en suite with a private office, outdoor seating area and a craft room. The East side has a powder room, 2 guest bedrooms each with an en suite and an attached casita with a bedroom suite & 5th bedroom. The open concept living area, with fireplace & pool table, has sliders that recess into the wall and when fully opened, brings the outdoors in. The expansive outdoor patio, with a its BBQ kitchen, fireplace, TV & retractable shades, overlooks the amazing backyard with mountain views, grand pool/spa & fire pit. Turnkey furnished per the inventory. This is a must see estate that is priced to sell.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.MiscString4: Golf Course View,Lake View,Mountain View,Panoramic View
featured_prop.Remarks: Custom home at the Hideaway by award winning architect Frank Stoltz! 4 BR, 4.5 BA including casita + office. Approx. 6,000 sq. ft. on .46 acre lot. Impressive foyer entry with French doors to courtyard with fireplace. Great room with fireplace and custom bar. Formal dining with walk-in wine cellar. Gourmet kitchen with center island, top of the line appliances butler's pantry & breakfast nook. Elegant master suite with fireplace and guest suite with bonus room and terrace. Entertainment loggia with fireplace, B.B.Q. kitchen with seating and custom pool with separate spa. Unobstructed double fairway, lake and mountain views located on the 17th & 11th of the Clive Clark course. Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Appliances: Freezer,Ice Maker,Garbage Disposal,Warmer Oven Drawer,Electric Oven,Microwave,Refrigerator,Trash Compactor,Dishwasher,Built-In
featured_prop.Directions: South Palm Canyon to Bogert Trail, left to 1000 (before the bridge), on your left.
featured_prop.ParkingDesc: Gated,Driveway - Concrete,On Site,Guest,Covered Parking,Porte-Cochere,Auto Driveway Gate,Carport,Circular Driveway
featured_prop.Remarks: The ultimate Palm Springs experience awaits you in this Mid-Century Ranch/Lodge Estate sited on an elevated 2.29 acre +/- fully landscaped parcel. Built in 1967 for Academy Award winning Bud Furer, this walled and gated property was the first to be constructed in the Andreas Hills neighborhood of South Palm Springs and arguably has the finest elevation and views of any surrounding property. Further, it's single family ownership since new has ensured its proper care and loving, sympathetic upkeep. The main house consists of 5 enormous ensuites, including the master with fireplace, media room, and open kitchen/living/dining areas. The freestanding guest house has a living room with fireplace, bedroom + bath and full kitchen. The north/south tennis court and hotel-sized lagoon pool/spa/waterfall dot the landscape for unending recreation. Filled with history, love, and California casual style, this opportunity awaits its second family's stewardship.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Custom Contemporary new to market at the Hideaway Golf Club! Four bedroom, four and a half baths including guest casita. Approx. 4,800 sq. ft. on .43 acre lot. Features courtyard entry to beautiful formal entry. Fabulous open floor plan makes the ultimate great room with fireplace, media, sitting area, custom indoor/outdoor bar, formal dining room and gourmet stainless kitchen with center island with pop-up media and butler's pantry. Pocket doors open to include the loggia with fireplace, media, wet bar and BBQ. An absolute entertainer's dream including custom pool with waterfalls, raised spa and fire and ice. Custom fire pit, outdoor seating area and the most amazing lake and double fairway views overlooking the 13th of the Pete Dye course. Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Directions: HWY 111 To Frank Sinatra - up the hill to the gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Finally, the home you always wished you could find in Mirada , has at last been built. A genuinely modern architectural project, inspired by Richard Neutra, realized by a collaboration between the leading modernist architecture and design studios in the US. Jim Schmidt AIA from Los Angles, Mark Nichols Interior Design, and Marcello Villano Landscape Design have come together with DW Johnston Construction to offer the ultimate modern house within the ultimate hillside community in Rancho Mirage. Mirada Estates was created to offer the pinnacle in luxury living with full amenities available from the nearby Ritz Carlton hotel. The House commands some of the finest views of the Coachella Valley, across to the snow-capped, mountains, and high above the airport and city lights. Simplicity of form and perfect siting offer a timeless and classic modernist home. This allows the natural surroundings and views to focus the attention while offering a seamless connection to the outdoors.

featured_prop.Directions: Bob Hope to Clancy Lane to The Renaissance gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Private gated estate on 1.31 acres in the heart of Rancho Mirage! Five bedrooms, seven and a half baths including guest casita. Featuring great room with grand two way fireplace with formal dining on the other side and sit down wet bar with patio access. Absolutely charming gourmet kitchen with beautiful wood and glass cabinets, extended island / counter bar, and top of the line appliances. Family room is adjacent with breakfast nook and wine cellar. Elegant master suite with fireplace, sitting area, inviting marble bath and custom closet. Guest casita has living area and wet bar. Pocket doors open to wonderful outdoor living area with resort like pool and raised spa. Outdoor bar with BBQ kitchen, and open cabana with fireplace overlooks the pool. All this and panoramic mountain views make this a Desert paradise! Offered furnished per inventory!Available for Lease.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Washington St. (south) to end (end at Tradition gate)
featured_prop.Remarks: Best south facing location on this gorgeous estate at The Tradition Golf Club! Remodeled and updated to perfection by designer Lance Fedderly and Associates. Four bedrooms, four baths and two powder rooms plus office and bonus room. Approx. 6,432 sq. ft. on .54 acre lot. Features lovely courtyard entry with fountain. Formal living room with fireplace, dining and wine closet. Family room with fireplace, dining and gourmet kitchen with center island, counter bar, stainless appliances and pantry. Office with built-ins and bonus room. Beautiful master suite with fireplace and two bedroom casita with both suites having full baths and patio to enjoy. The entertainment loggia has a fireplace, media and BBQ center. Custom pebble tech pool with waterfall and raised spa. From inside and outside you will enjoy the most incredible mountain backdrop located on the 14th fairway! Offered designer furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Directions: dd
featured_prop.MiscString4: Canyon View,City Lights View,Desert View,Golf Course View,Hills View,Mountain View,Panoramic View,Valley View
featured_prop.Remarks: Beautiful house with private golf course and lights at night views. All new furniture, carpets and paint. Not lived in sense being redone. Climate controlled wine storage. Pocketing glass in living room and family room. large side yard with pool and fire pit area. Home sits on golf course ant two small ponds. No golfers in view from the house. Master has large bath with separate his and her areas.

featured_prop.Directions: Monroe South, cross Avenue 54. Dirt road behind entry gates on your left, just past Estates at La Quinta
featured_prop.Remarks: Motivated Sellers have reduced the price over $750,000! List price is based on an August 2016 independent appraisal. The Tuscan ranch style home offers 4 bedrooms/4 baths, plus an attached game room and rooftop deck, with expansive unobstructed mountain views. The 12-car garage, which can possibly be converted into 2 additional bedrooms, has epoxy floors, TV, A/C & Heat plus Stereo! This manicured 4 acre property, includes RV parking, a pool house with outdoor kitchen, fireplace and large fire pit; three raised vegetable gardens, eight pastures, an arena w/ judges' stand, and a private bridle path. The 6,000 sf. Barn has a riders lounge, grooms' quarters, office & bathrooms, all under a 26 ft. tall wood beam ceiling with beautiful Chandeliers. Our Luxury Lease Mgmt. Co. states an approx. 6-7% CAP based on list price. The Contiguous 4 acre parcel is available, but not included in List Price. Come visit this remarkable property that is priced to sell this season! Appointment only.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Gorgeous Santa Barbara inspired estate by Francis Elkins famous designer of The Lodge at Pebble Beach! 4 BR, 4.5 BA including guest wing, approx. 6,049 sq. ft. on .49 acre lot. Features formal living room with beautiful wood floors and two fireplaces. Family room off gourmet kitchen with custom bar and dining. Separate guest wing and entertainment pavilion boasts two guest rooms, home theatre and game room (or 5th bedroom). Light and bright with only the finest materials and quality throughout including French doors, hand painted tiles and custom travertine flooring. Lovely patio with grass/paver terrace, large custom pool and BBQ center. One of the best south facing locations in the club with mountain and golf course views overlooking the 9th fairway of the Pete Dye course! Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Remarks: NEW HOME West facing on Tamarisk Country Club.Breathtaking mountain and fairway views.Sold TURNKEY furnished including Art! The best finishes and furnishings throughout. Beautiful neutral palette.Built by Stoker Construction.Ready to move into NOW!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Custom Contemporary estate on prime south facing flag lot at the Hideaway Golf Club! Four bedroom, four and a half baths including casita. Approx. 4,646 sq. ft. on .73 acre lot. Enter through park like grounds featuring a long winding driveway lined with gorgeous trees and flowers to a lovely courtyard entry with custom fountain. Great room with fireplace and dining. Family room and modern stainless gourmet kitchen w/center island and custom glass breakfast bar. Large master suite with gym, bonus room or extra office. The guest casita has a living room, bedroom and mini kitchen. Beautiful architecture and finishes throughout! Multiple pocket doors for wide open indoor/outdoor entertaining. Loggia and extended patio with outdoor fireplace dining and living areas. Custom pool with waterfalls, ponds, a tanning shelf and wading pool. Amazing south facing views of lake, mountains and the 4th fairway of the Pete Dye course! Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Frank Sinatra (south) to Mirada gate

featured_prop.Remarks: Gorgeous custom Contemporary by Steven DeChristopher Jr. at Mirada Estates. Three bedrooms, four and a half baths, approx. 5,327 sq. ft. on .53 acre lot. Features lovely waterfall with water under the bridge drive. Elegant foyer to great room with massive custom fireplace, formal dining room, wet bar and adjoining family room with media. Wonderful wine tasting cellar, gourmet stainless kitchen with center island, counter bar and prep kitchen. Mater suite with fireplace and dual spa inspired baths. Wonderful outdoor living area with fire pit, BBQ center, custom pool with raised spa and rock waterfall. Incredible panoramic mountain, valley and city light views! Furnishings are available! The Ritz Carlton 5 Star Hotel, Rancho Mirage!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.MiscString4: Golf Course View,Lake View,Mountain View,Panoramic View
featured_prop.Remarks: Hideaway estate beautifully updated in a Contemporary design by Lance Fedderly and Associates. Gorgeous light and bright new furnishings and interiors. 4 BR, 4.5 BA including separate casita and office. Approx. 5,055 sq. ft. on.41 acre lot. Featuring beautiful paved courtyard with towering fireplace. Great room with fireplace w/ pocket doors opening to large outdoor living area overlooking lake fairway and mountain views. Formal dining room, open gourmet kitchen, separate refrigerated wine room and wet bar. Large master suite with fireplace and dual walk-in closets. Bonus room is upstairs with 1 BR suite, includes living room with fireplace, wet bar and private balcony with west mountain views. Large loggia with outdoor living area with fireplace. Beautiful custom pool with bowls of fire & spa plus built-in barbecue. Double fairway and mountain views located on the 4th hole of the Pete Dye course! Furnished per inventory! Membership not required

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Authentic Colonial Spanish estate at the Hideaway! Architect Jeffrey L. Miller has designed a home with old world richness and charm while providing for all the modern day comforts. 5 BD, 5 BA + 2 powder rooms, approximately 4,879 sq. ft. on .43 acre lot. Features a courtyard colonnade entry, great room with fireplace, and large formal dining room. Beautiful gourmet kitchen with custom cabinetry using aged patina for that centuries old look, counter bar and breakfast nook. Lofty hammer-beam ceilings, Baroque chandeliers, patterned tiles and terra-cotta tile throughout. Rows of French doors open to a colonnade of bold Tuscan arches and columns hosting an outdoor living area with fireplace dining and bar. Custom pool with inlaid spa and fire pit. Best west views of mountains and golf course situated between the 10th and the 18th of the Clive Clark course! Offered furnished per inventory! Exclusive Interiors by Jeannette Kyser!

featured_prop.Directions: Jefferson main gate to via Pessaro(first right)home is on the left
featured_prop.Remarks: Welcome to where Santa Barbara meets the desert in this beautifully landscaped custom residence located on the 9th hole of the Pete Dye Course at The Hideaway Golf Club. This luxury residence offers spectacular lake and long fairway views! Designed around incredible over sized arched windows, maximizing views and framing the great room, dining room, fabulous kitchen, wet bar and dual sided fireplace and media center. Four bedrooms, four and a half baths, office, and two room guest casita with panoramic views from balconies of majestic mountains, flowers and golf course. The interiors are gorgeous and furniture was custom designed for the home by well known designer Jeanette Christian. Outdoor living area with fireplace, fountain, barbecue area and custom pool and spa. Really pretty and great home for entertaining! The home exudes warmth and richness and high quality. A must see!

featured_prop.Directions: Take Clancy Lane east from Bob Hope. At stop sign turn left in Renaissance gate. First right on Milton and at end of street is #7.
featured_prop.Remarks: Gorgeous Tuscan estate located on Clancy Lane in the exclusive gated community of The Renaissance. 7 bedrooms, 8.5 baths including 3 casitas - 2 detached, 1 attached. Approx. 8,179 sq. ft. on over an acre of beautiful grounds. Featuring gated entry & circular drive w/custom fountain. Living room w/dramatic ceilings, custom fireplace & wet bar. Formal dining room with fireplace, wine cellar & butler's pantry. Gourmet kitchen w/center island, wrap around counter bar & stainless appliances. Family room w/fireplace and study. En suite guest rooms and an incredible master suite with sitting area and fireplace. Wonderful master bath with 2 water closets, 2 vanity areas and 2 spacious walk-in closets plus cedar lined closet. Each casita has an additional bedroom & 2 have living rooms. Pocket doors open to wonderful resort style pool w/water fall fountain & raised spa. Loggia off guest house hosts a BBQ kitchen, bar & outdoor fireplace. This estate has it all including south & west views!

featured_prop.Directions: As you enter Tradition, make a rt on Deacon Drive, another rt on Del Gato. Left on Claret Cove, left on Talking Rock Turn.
featured_prop.MiscString4: Golf Course View,Mountain View,Panoramic View,Pool View
featured_prop.Remarks: This stunning south facing sprawling custom home is resplendent with light featuring 3 bedrooms, 3.5 baths plus a separate office, approx. 4790 sq ft sitting on the 14th fairway hole on a quiet interior location with the most spectacular mountain views in Tradition on one of the most sought after streets. The home allows for perfect formal and casual entertaining areas enhanced with soaring dramatic angled cedar ceilings in the dining room, office and living room. Enjoy outdoor living by the lagoon shaped resort style pool/spa with a cascading rock waterfall looking out to the incredible mountain backdrop on an estate size lot. Amenities include travertine stone floors, gourmet granite island kitchen w/stainless appliances, marble bathrooms and more. This is a wow factor home not to be missed. Offered furnished per inventory.

featured_prop.Directions: From East Palm Canyon Drive, turn South onto Smoke Tree Lane - proceed to Guard gate.
featured_prop.Remarks: Historic home in the ultimate historic Palm Springs area of Smoke Tree Ranch. 5 Bedrooms, 4 bathrooms with really great separation of space allowing the perfect setting for welcoming family and friends to the ranch. Swimming pool with swimmers lane allows for daily laps and enjoys directly southern exposure with incredible views of the south canyon. A truly enchanting western meet early California desert aesthetic creates the perfect scene for enjoying all the desert has to offer.

featured_prop.Directions: Monterey to Frank Sinatra (west) to Vista Dunes (south) gate on right side
featured_prop.Remarks: Beautiful Santa Barbara Mission style Estate in the heart of Rancho Mirage! Four bedrooms, four and a half baths. Approximately 4,887 sq. ft. on one acre lot. Located in a private gated enclave with lovely courtyard entry this home features great room with fireplace and custom bar. Formal dining room and old world wine cellar. Gourmet kitchen with center island / counter bar, and family room with fireplace and breakfast nook. Large master suite with fireplace and inviting bath. Extended patios, full outdoor kitchen and resort like pool with separate spa. Custom fireplace with seating area and fire pit. Lushly landscaped grounds with fruit trees, putting green and the most amazing panoramic mountain views!

Master suite with fireplace and spa inspired bath. Detached casita overlooking custom fountain offers privacy for your guests. Pocket doors open to outdoor living area with fireplace and media. Custom pool with cascading waterfalls and separate spa. Built-in BBQ center with bar and expansive golf course views of the 13th fairway of the Pete Dye course! Furnished per inventory

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate

Featuring impressive courtyard entry, fabulous great room with fireplace, dining and custom bar. Family room off gourmet kitchen with state of the art appliances and center island. Gorgeous master suite with fireplace and exquisite bath. Pocket doors open to entertainment loggia with fireplace, B.B.Q. center, custom pool & spa. Great golf course, mountain views and lake views located on the 2nd hole of the Pete Dye course! Furnished per inventory! Seller will consider trade.

featured_prop.Remarks: The Perfect 10! A magnificent southern view of the lake, mountains, and the 2nd hole of the private Weiskopf Golf Course which is truly captivating. This luxurious showcase home features 4621 sq ft, 3bdrms, 4.5 ba including a private casita, plus a media room w/bar + fireplace and an office. Exceptional interior amenities throughout including custom gated entry courtyard w/fireplace, built-ins, wine room, gourmet granite island kitchen, natural stone floors, grand master bedroom suite and more. It is beautifully appointed with designer furnishings included. The resort-style backyard is breathtaking with extraordinary infinity pool overlooking the lake, stone enhanced BBQ & bar entertainment center, plus awnings. You won't find a location to compare!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Incredible deal on this custom beauty at the Hideaway Golf Club! Four bedrooms, four and a half baths, approx.. 4,696 sq. ft. on .29 acre lot. Features courtyard entry with fireplace and custom fountain. Impressive entry rotunda opens to great room with fireplace, dining area and wine cellar. Gourmet kitchen with center island and top of the line appliances. Master suite with fireplace and large guest suite with view balcony. Fine finishes throughout including hand cut stone flooring, imported light fixtures and more! Pocket doors open to entertainment loggia with fireplace and BBQ center. Custom pool with raised spa and waterfall. Fabulous lake and fairway views on the 9th of the Pete Dye course! Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Beautiful custom Spanish style estate at Hideaway Golf Club! Four bedrooms, four and a half baths including casita. Approx. 4,269 sq. ft. on .32 acre lot. Features great room with fireplace, built-in media and bar. Formal dining room, one of a kind gourmet kitchen with center island, counter bar, top of the line appliances and breakfast nook. Master suite with fireplace, wet bar, sitting area and spa inspired bath with his and her closets. Pocket doors open to loggia with media. Custom pool with waterfalls and raised spa. Fire pit, BBQ and incredible double lake, mountain and fairway views on the 17th of the Pete Dye course! Available for lease!

featured_prop.Directions: Toscana main gate is off Fred Waring between Washington and Cook Streets
featured_prop.Remarks: Best south location on this stunning Toscana home! Four bedroom, four and a half baths including detached casita. Approx. 4,886 sq. ft. on .29 acre lot. Features lovely courtyard entry, great room with fireplace, awesome bar and formal dining. Gourmet kitchen with center island / bar, top of the line appliances, breakfast nook and family room with built-in entertainment center. Beautiful finishes and built-ins can be found throughout. Large master suite with inviting bath, guest casita with sitting room and two more welcoming guest rooms. Dual patios host wonderful outdoor living and dining space. Built-in BBQ center, custom pool with waterfalls and spa. Incredible south facing lake views located on the Jack Nicklaus Signature south course. Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Directions: Main Gate at Country Club Drive: Take Indian Ridge Drive straight to south side (by owner-only gate at Hovley) - Turn left on to Fire Dance...home will be on your left.
featured_prop.MiscString4: Golf Course View,Lake View,Mountain View,Panoramic View
featured_prop.Remarks: Contemporary home in the Desert! Elevated with views of 4 holes, this Pool/Spa home is an entertainer's dream! Recently updated by a well- known designer, this wide open floor plan is great for a few or many! Upon entering, your guests will be amazed at the forever views! Offered furnished, this home has 24'' diagonal travertine flooring, updated kitchen with glass tile backsplash, leathered Santa Cecelia stone counters, new Stainless appliances, new carpeting, & new master closet fittings. The expansive, airy great room can be configured so many ways. The wet bar in the center has a wonderful view & features refrigerator & wine cooler. Outside, the Pebble Tech pool and spa sit high above the world with mountain views. Entertain friends by your built in BBQ. The private, detached casita by the courtyard fireplace has updated finishes & new carpets. Garage has crisp epoxied floor...many love this model's garage as it fits two golf carts! Offered furnished excluding art.

featured_prop.Directions: Country Club Dr. to Keenan Dr. Turn West 1 block to Kaye Ballard Lane and turn right. Front door is on Kaye Ballard Lane.
featured_prop.Remarks: The Kenaston Residence, E. Stewart Williams, 1957 is sited on over a half-acre, street-to-street lot near Thunderbird Country Club in the Desert Ranch Estates neighborhood. This authentically restored home utilizes the hallmarks of the Mid-Century Master's style: Walls of glass, floating fireplace, cantilevered roof lines, boulder walls that appear to float over water, & gleaming walnut wood panels. Spacious rooms flow easily from indoors to open & covered patios, pool & spa that defines desert living at its finest. Interiors include living & dining rooms, large den/media room, center-island eat in kitchen, dual master suites + 2 additional guest bedrooms and 1.5 baths. The home has been published multiple times, including the infamous Brad Pitt/Angelina Jolie spread in W Magazine. Designated on the RM Register of Historic Places, the Kenaston Residence takes advantage of the CA Mills Act which provides for substantial property tax abatement. There are garages for 4 cars as well!

featured_prop.Directions: Enter Legends gate, right on Troon Way, left on Shinnecock Hills, right on Ballybunion
featured_prop.Remarks: Spectacular picturesque setting with panoramic lake & mountain views overlooking the 10th, 11th, and 12th holes of the Weiskopf private course, this gorgeous semi-custom Summit home exudes pure luxury and shows just like a model featuring 4 bdrms + office/workout space, 5 baths, with approx. 4,732 sq ft. Entertain in style with this open and inviting floorplan featuring Travertine floors, rich wood doors, a spacious gourmet granite island kitchen w/top of the line appliances including Groehe faucets, luxurious master bedroom/bath suite, and crown molding throughout. Enjoy outdoor living by the salt water pool/spa with cascading waterfalls, built-in barbecue, flatscreen TV, Kool Fog misters, and stacked-stone firepit. Offered designer custom furnished per inventory.

featured_prop.Directions: PCH to 1st Street
featured_prop.Remarks: Sophisticated and warm, this intelligent beach retreat West of PCH will delight and impress! A freestanding townhouse with fine finishes and wonderful details throughout...from the richly appointed chef's kitchen to the stone, tile and generous use of wood, you'll find great volume and high ceilings. Lots of windows and private decks provide plenty of sun and dramatic ocean views. Luxurious master retreat, stunning bath and huge walk-in closet. Friends, family or work at home? Quality guest bedrooms, and a large office make it so easy to adjust to life at the beach! Pet friendly with a small front yard. Great double garage with lots of storage. 703 1st is a prime location for walking and easy access in and out of town. CLICK VIRTUAL MEDIA for 3D Matterport tour !!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to 54th (east) to Madison (south) to 58th (west) to Quarry gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Beautiful custom Contemporary by Guy Drier Design at the exclusive Quarry Golf Club! 3 BR, 3.5 BA, approx. 3,875 sq. ft. on .51 acre lot. Features great room with custom fireplace and pocket doors for indoor/outdoor entertaining. Formal dining with custom wet bar. Gourmet stainless kitchen with center island, counter bar and breakfast room. Large master suite with dual fireplace to exquisite bath. Outdoor living area with BBQ, fire pit, infinity pool with fire water way & spa. Gorgeous mountain and down valley views!

featured_prop.DiningRoomDesc: Breakfast Nook,Breakfast Room,Breakfast/Bar,Dining Area,Eat In Kitchen,Formal Dining Rm,Kitchen Island,Ktchn/DiningCombo
featured_prop.Directions: west on vists chino to noth on via norte to west on panorama road
featured_prop.Remarks: Enter the gates of this Prestigious mid-century modern estate at 777 panorama rd and be prepared to experience what it would be like living in sheer elegance and owning a wonderful piece of Palm Springs life . Let the views of the beautiful Santa Rosa mountains wash over you ,either in your prestigious master suite or in your sleek and sophisticated guest house. The home is truly amazing from lighting designer James Callahan , to superb detail in architecture rarely seen today . The residence is the Ultra of Executive homes with fine detail far from the ordinary but again living in the area known as Billionaires Row in the Little Tuscany of Palm Springs it is no surprise.

featured_prop.Directions: PGA Blvd. to the Stadium gate. Turn right at Pebblebeach and follow around the curve. On your Left. Look for my sign.
featured_prop.Remarks: This custom home on the Lake at PGA West in La Quinta has the Wow factor we are all looking for! Open the carved, wooden entry gate to the peaceful courtyard. The detached Casita , just inside the gates, is complete with fireplace, Bar/refrig. nook, and it's own porch. The main home front doors swing open to a magnificent great room to dining to kitchen space, and out to the Lake and mountain views beyond. Open the floor to ceiling glass wall to the covered outdoor living space, to the Infiniti edge pool/spa, which appears to drop into the lake. Approx. 4636 sf., the main home features 3 Ensuite bedrooms + powder room, a large Media room, and large Laundry room. The 4 car + golf carts garage, is approx. 1200 sf., and has it's own off street driveway! Spacious yards on both sides of the home, compliment the gorgeous backyard, which has a built-in BBQ station, and lots of covered living space. This Grand home has Drama, Privacy, and unparalleled VIEWS!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Beautiful plan 3 Villa at the Hideaway Golf Club! Three bedroom, three and a half baths including detached casita plus office. Approx. 3,170 sq. ft. on .27 acre lot. Features lovely courtyard entry with fountain. Living room with custom bar and family room with gourmet stainless kitchen with center island and breakfast nook. Large master suite and separate casita with fireplace and wet bar. Loggia with fireplace, media and BBQ center. Sparkling pool with raised spa and waterfall. Perfect south mountain fairway and waterfall views on the 4th fairway of the Clive Clark course! Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Gorgeous Villa at the Hideaway Golf Club! Three bedroom, three and a half baths including casita plus office. Approx. 3,291 sq. ft. on .21 acre lot. Features lovely courtyard entry with fountain. Great room with fireplace, formal dining and custom bar. Gourmet kitchen with center island/bar and stainless appliances. Large master suite with spa inspired bath, casita with wet bar and handsome office. Beautiful interior design by Kim Rocca. Pocket doors open to loggia with dining and BBQ center. Custom pool with waterfalls and raised spa. Custom fire pit and very private location with south facing mountain and golf course views on the 5th fairway of the Clive Clark course! Offered furnished per inventory! Hideaway membership is available!

featured_prop.Directions: Off of Hwy 111 at Evening Star (just east of Country Club Drive/111)- enter at Thunderbird Cove gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Remarkably chic home located in the private gated enclave of Thunderbird Cove. Fully remodeled in high style and with a superior attention to detail. Home includes sumptuous Master Suite and 3 additional bedroom suites, lavish living and dining, beautiful large kitchen with such features as Thermador gas range and ovens, chilled wine cabinet, an adjacent breakfast area and family room. There is a good flow from the living areas to the private pool/spa complete with picturesque water fall and mountain views.

featured_prop.Directions: Jefferson South to Airport Blvd. Head East to Hwy 86. South to 61st. Turn left. Farm is on your right. Sign in front of gate.
featured_prop.Remarks: Beautiful, manageable farm in Thermal, CA. 20 acres, fully fenced and offering both a private WELL and CVWD water for irrigation. Three large, grassy pastures, a 10-stall Breezeway barn with grooms' quarters; complete with a bathroom, and wall A/C units. Comfortable, 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom Mobile home with covered parking, and an attached garage. PLUS a small permanent house, which could be a perfect caretakers' cottage. Also..a Covered Hay Barn & Hot-walker. Electronic security gates, open to the driveway, with Paved road frontage onto 61st. It is approx. 1/2 mile from Hwy. 86. HITS showgrounds are approx. 4 miles, Eldorado & Empire Polo fields approx. 15 minute with a trailer, the Thermal Club and also Jacqueline Cochran Regional Airport are a short drive. Shopping and Gas are approx. 5 miles away in Coachella. Surrounded by Date Farms, the soil is fertile, and the VIEWS are supurb! Be sure to take the Virtual Tour to get a better Feel for this beautiful farm!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Highly upgraded and modified Plan 4 Villa at the Hideaway Golf Club! Three bedroom, three and a half baths including casita plus office. Approx. 3,291 sq. ft. on .21 acre lot. Features courtyard entry, great room with fireplace and gourmet kitchen with center island / breakfast bar. Wet bar and formal dining room. Large master suite with inviting bath and enlarged walk in closet. Pocket doors open to loggia with dining and a custom pass thru wet bar. Beautiful finishes throughout and professionally decorated. Sparkling salt water pool with raised spa and the best south facing views of mountains and golf course on the 5th of the Clive Clark course! Offered furnished per inventory! Hideaway membership is available.

featured_prop.DiningRoomDesc: Breakfast Nook,Eat In Kitchen,Formal Dining Rm
featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Bob Hope (north) to Clancy Lane (right)
featured_prop.Remarks: One of a kind custom estate on prestigious Clancy Lane! 4 BR, 6 BA including 1 BR casita. Approx. 5,054 sq. ft. on nearly one acre lot. Featuring circle drive, beautiful French inspired stone exterior and park like grounds. Great room with fireplace, custom wet bar and gourmet stainless kitchen with counter bar surround, breakfast nook with brick fireplace, wine closet and walk in pantry. Large formal dining room and family room with fireplace. Gorgeous finishes throughout. This home was originally built for NFL running back Jim Krieg in 1985, then re-imagined by renowned interior designer Don Brady with artwork by internationally acclaimed artist Tom Judd. The master suite includes a fireplace and custom window seat with elegant classic bath. Adorable one bedroom guest casita has a living room with wet bar, shower room with full sauna and dipping pool. The large outdoor entertainment area with awesome wood deck, custom salt water pool & separate spa. Furnishings are available.

featured_prop.Directions: 111 To Palo Verde
featured_prop.Remarks: The ultimate mini tennis estate in Palm Springs offers a really great mid-century designed home re-built in 2005. The current estate purchased the property directly behind in 2008 and in order to build a new sunken tennis court making this one of the most unique offerings in Palm Springs. The house offers a great streamlined presence and lots of wall space perfect for people looking for a desert home to display their collection. Pool, spa, roof top patio, water feature, sunken fire pit and seating area offer great outdoor entertaining spaces while the open kitchen is perfect for entertaining. The master suite is actually accessed by walking outside and offers great separation from your other house guests. A perfect Palm Springs getaway for people looking for that perfect little jewel box that lives larger than the square footage indicates.

featured_prop.Directions: Morningside Drive to front gate. Left on Fincher Way
featured_prop.Remarks: The most tranquil setting in Morningside; lake, mountain and fairway views! Lite, bright, volume ceilings. Great Room, Morning Room off kitchen. Guest Suite with Sitting Room. Wonderful entertaining home in ideal location!

featured_prop.Directions: Inside main gate, right on Irontree Drive, left on Sunrose Lane, right on Crosby Lane. Home is on left hand side.
featured_prop.Remarks: Gorgeous contemporary classic home inside the gates of Ironwood Country Club. Extraordinary entry to home with custom water features, infinity saltwater pool, spa, outdoor kitchen, dramatic landscape lighting and mountain views make this the perfect place to entertain guests and enjoy the Ironwood lifestyle. On the South side of the home there is another entertaining space with a built in BBQ, custom fire pit and more beautiful mountain views. This home boasts 4 large Suites and 5 baths. The guest wing has 2 suites and is separate from the master bedroom. The suite next to the master bedroom has a built in office and sofa bed. The large, well-equiped kitchen has an island and wine closet. This home has been professionally decorated and comes furnished per inventory. If you are looking for an exceptional home in South Palm Desert and/or Ironwood Country Club, you simply must see this home. Seller is motivated and may consider trade for smaller property in Ironwood.

featured_prop.Directions: Jefferson South to 54th. Turn left. Proceed to stop sign (Madison) Turn right. Pass Greg Norman course on left, Entry to Legends on left. Turn right through Legends gate, follow left to Mountain View. Turn left, home down a bit on the left.
featured_prop.Remarks: This Ventana sits on one of the most gorgeous West facing, elevated, over-sized, Fairway (14th of the Nick Tournament), VIEW lots in this area of PGA West. The Saltwater Pool with raised Spa perches above the Fairway, and the outdoor dining spaces and Fire pit add to the indoor/outdoor entertainment venue, which this ever popular floor plan is known for! It's very Rare to find a Grassy, large, side yard on a golf course property. What a great place for pets, children, or a friendly game of volleyball. Along with the 3 ensuite bedrooms in the main house, one of the Bonus rooms has been set up as a 4th sleeping quarters. The large, private Casita offers a 5th bedroom. Floor to ceiling Stacked Stone fireplace surround, stacked stone accents on the Wet bar, and custom stone in the formal dining room. Plantation shutters throughout plus cooling ceiling fans. Offered Turnkey furnished.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Thunderbird Cove entrance to first street on left Sundance
featured_prop.Remarks: Incredible deal on this custom beauty at Thunderbird Cove! Five bedroom, five baths and two powder rooms. 6,679 sq. ft. on half acre lot. Features formal entry to family room with fireplace, gourmet kitchen with island breakfast bar, breakfast room and wine room. Formal living room with stone fireplace, and formal dining room. Large master retreat with adjacent sitting room or office with fireplace and unique view bath with vanity island and old fashioned soaking tub. Spacious guests suites and office with built-ins. Extended patio with BBQ center, custom fire pit, sparkling pool with water features and inlaid spa. Super private with mountain backdrop and south facing desert landscape views!

featured_prop.Directions: South on Jefferson into PGA Blvd, Enter Jack Nicklaus Gate, Left on Riviera,Right on Merion, Home is on the left side.
featured_prop.MiscString4: Golf Course View,Lake Front View,Lake View,Mountain View,Panoramic View,Water View
featured_prop.Remarks: Million Dollar View! This is a one of kind home with the wow factor is not to be missed with endless views overlooking the 13th green on Private Nicklaus Course and truly stunning lake & Coral Mountain views. This beautiful Gallery 3 plan has been totally redone with a contemporary flair and features 4 bedrooms, 4 baths, approx. 3,880 sq ft, a private gated courtyard entry with water feature, walls of glass highlighting the magnificent views, and a gourmet Quartz island kitchen with birch cabinets and built in wine cooler open to family room entertaining. Other amenities include hand-rubbed oak floors, granite lava shells from Belgium, venetian plaster, electric blinds, new double pane windows, 100 year old teak wood in the bar, and a steam shower in the master bathroom and more. Enjoy the magnificent views in the inviting backyard including a salt water pebble tec pool/spa with cascading waterfall. Offered designer furnished with custom furniture per inventory.

featured_prop.Directions: Verdugo Road to Fern. East to Allanjay. Turn left and property is on left.
featured_prop.MiscString4: Catalina View,City Lights View,Mountain View,Panoramic View
featured_prop.Remarks: Views,Views,Views!Premier lot on a rare, nearly one acre of land in San Rafael Estates, offering panoramic views of city lights and mountains that stretch to the ocean. This single-level, 3 bed, 2.5 bath home features an open layout with large-scale rooms that feature tremendous views and access to the expansive grounds for effortless indoor/outdoor living. Inside find hardwood flooring, a great room concept combining the living and dining rooms with full bar and fireplace, a bright kitchen with abundant cabinet space and breakfast area, two spacious bedrooms, and master suite featuring sliding doors to the rear yard, spa bath, and large walk-in closet. Outdoors, a large deck, built-in barbecue, firepit, pool and spa all overlook the serene vistas. Also noteworthy are the gated motorcourt, 3-car garage, dedicated laundry room and the entire property walled and fenced for privacy. The possibilities are endless and all just a stroll away from the Glendale Sports Complex

featured_prop.Directions: Manitou gate to Iroquois (left) to Villaggio (left)
featured_prop.Remarks: Tuscan inspired Ministrelli home in prestigious Villaggio at Indian Wells Country Club! Three bedroom, three and a half baths, approximately 3,572 sq. ft. on .28 acre lot. Features gated courtyard entry with custom fountain. Great room with fireplace and built-in entertainment center. Gourmet kitchen with center island and built-in desk. Pocket doors open to entertainment loggia with fireplace and built-in BBQ. Private pool with raised waterfall spa. Beautiful mountain and golf course views on the 5th fairway of the Cove Course.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 11 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Sought after Talavera model completely remodeled at the Hideaway Golf Club! 4 BR, 4.5 baths. Approximately 2,756 sq. ft. New interiors that are updated in the latest in color and design. Features great room with fireplace, dining and gourmet stainless kitchen with with counter bar. Large master suite and 1 BR casita with lovely view patio with fireplace. Brand new sparkling pool and spa and fire & ice just added. Entertainment loggia, BBQ center and custom bar. Perfect mountain and golf course views with walk to clubhouse location. Offered furnished! Hideaway membership is available on this property.

featured_prop.Directions: Palms gate is off Airport Blvd. between Madison and Monroe
featured_prop.Remarks: Priced to sell!!! Beautiful custom home with perfect southwest views at The Palms! Four bedrooms, four and a half baths including casita. Approx. 4,672 sq. ft. on .35 acre lot. Features courtyard entry with fountain. Great room with fireplace, custom bar, dining and game room. Gourmet kitchen with top of the line appliances, center island, counter bar, butler's pantry and breakfast nook. Master suite with fireplace and inviting bath. Loggia with fireplace, custom salt water pool with rock waterfall and raised spa. BBQ island and the most amazing southwest golf course and mountain views on the 14th fairway of this Fred Couples designed course! Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Directions: Enter Mountain View gates. Proceed on Pomelo which changes to Verano, to the end. Turn right on El Dorado to the address.
featured_prop.MiscString4: Golf Course View,Lake View,Mountain View,Pool View,Water View
featured_prop.Remarks: Elegant 4BD/4.5BA, 4449 sf Ventana model in the resort/golf community of Mountain View CC. Open courtyard leads into the tastefully decorated great room with crown molding, stack stone fireplace, cherry wood wall design, Travertine marble floors and generous wet bar. The family living area has custom entertainment center and is open to the kitchen. Kitchen has granite counters, Kitchen Aide appliances, island, pantry and breakfast area. Find solace in the master suite with custom built-ins, serving bar, quiet sitting area and walk in closets. Additional amenities include a walk-in dual shower, jetted tub and dual vanities. All guest rooms have en suite baths and walk in closets. The media/game room is perfect with wainscoting and built in media center. Spectacular views from the south facing patio are complimented by the large salt water pool/spa, shade overhang, custom concrete and views of two fairways and lake.The 3 car garage has a clean look with epoxy concrete treatment.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 - GATE at Mountain Cove Drive: Straight on Mountain Cove Drive to Monte Sereno Drive, turn right. Turn right on Yavapa - Home will be on your left.
featured_prop.Remarks: Custom contemporary, furnished, 4 bedroom estate behind the Mountain Cove Gate in the Monte Sereno Estates! Two separate outdoor spaces! Totally private, the sunny front-loaded pool/spa area with covered patio is a wonderful entertaining space with stunning mountain views! In the back, off kitchen & family room, you'll find tranquil backyard with lush landscaping, a bubbling fountain, built-in BBQ and trees filled with happy birds. Inside, the Living Room/Dining/Wet bar area all capture the wonderful mountain views. The contemporary walls allow the light into the kitchen, hall and beyond. The double-sided fireplace is elegant and a great design element. The large family room is off the kitchen...with views to the private backyard. The master suite has great mountain views and is right off the pool and spa in the front. There is another bedroom with its own bath and two other guest rooms that share a bath (one is currently furnished as an office). See Attached 3D Virtual Tour!

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Best location overlooking lake on this Hideaway Golf Club villa! Three bedroom, three and a half baths including guest casita. Approx. 2,644 sw. ft. on .21 acre lot. Features formal entry to great room with fireplace and wet bar with wine refrigerator. Gourmet stainless kitchen with center island / counter bar and dining. Large master suite with sitting area and inviting bath. Stacking doors open to loggia with dining, built-in BBQ and misting system. Sparkling pool with raised waterfall spa and amazing south mountain, lake and fairway views on the 6th of the Clive Clark course. Offered furnished per inventory!

featured_prop.Directions: South on Madison, cross 58th, enter the Andalusia gate on your left. Proceed on Andalusia Dr. past the Sales Center, hard left on to Carboneras. House is at the end of the street on the right, on a private drive.
featured_prop.LotDescription: Close to Clubhouse,Lake Front,On Golf Course
Close to Clubhouse,Lake Front,On Golf Course
featured_prop.MiscString4: Golf Course View,Lake View,Mountain View,Panoramic View
featured_prop.Remarks: You really won't believe this view and this home with all its upgrades for the price. Please visit to see and compare. Premier elevated lot with views over two fairways, lake, and the beloved Santa Rosa mountains. Enthralled with Andalusia but can't wait for new construction? Enjoy the NW territorial views from the tip-top lot right now.Replete with 2 room detached casita w/kitchenette and fireplace; custom alcove wine display in the entry, and custom entertainment centers in the great room and master bedroom, the upgrades are already done for you: new plank-tile flooring in the master bath w/cherrywood closet; rich slab granite kitchen counter-tops with 3 inch bullnose; finished garage with custom cabinetry. The large master bedroom suite opens out upon the infinity pool and bubbling spa, from where you can take in spectacular sunsets in ultimate privacy. This home is located a stroll away from the clubhouse, tennis courts, restaurants, and range. See virtual tour attached.

featured_prop.Directions: Enter the Citrus through the Avenue 52 gate. Once through the gate, immediately turn left on Citrus. Continue on Citrus, following the curve. Turn right on Lima. The home will be on the left side.
featured_prop.Remarks: Call to hear about Golf Membership Incentive offered on this one of a kind semi-custom home located on a coveted quiet cul-de-sac- amazing flow, no wasted space, & oversized windows/sliders bringing the outdoors in. Enter through the private gate and find an inviting center patio with large spa (spool), private sitting area, & a sunny southern exposure. Directly off the patio is a large 2 room detached casita with custom touches & built-ins. Enter the home & be captivated by a large bright great room, travertine floors, crown molding, a custom entertainment center, & a spacious back patio w/ western views looking over the 5th fairway of the private golf course. The floor plan includes a gourmet kitchen with Viking stainless steel appliances & upgraded granite, all open to the dining room & great room. That back patio is large, inviting, & special with a cozy fireplace, bar area, and many different seating vignettes. Offered furnished per inventory list.

featured_prop.Directions: Enter the Citrus through the Avenue 52 gate. Once through the gate, immediately turn left on Citrus. Continue on Citrus following the curve. Turn right on Lima. The home will be at the end of the street on the left side.
featured_prop.Remarks: Such a well priced home in The Citrus! This semi-custom home is located at the 5th green with beautiful/expansive views of the 5th & 6th fairways! The location offers a private setting near the end of the cul de sac on an interior street with all other custom homes! The home has been well maintained and it shows. The center patio opens up to double front doors which lead to the formal entrance hall and highly upgraded flooring throughout. The formal livingroom, with its elegant fireplace, creates a relaxing atmosphere and adds to the luxury & warmth found throughout the home. Just around the corner is the beautiful large gourmet kitchen which opens up to a cozy family room with another fireplace, a built in media center and an informal dining area, all of which have views of the custom pool/spa (salt water system) & the lush golf course. There are 4 bedrooms, one of which is being used as an office. This is a fabulous home at a great price !

featured_prop.DiningRoomDesc: Breakfast Room,Breakfast/Bar,Dining Area,Eat In Kitchen,Formal Dining Rm
featured_prop.Directions: Enter Main gate on Washington Street. Left through security. Left on Descanso Lane. At the Y, keep left. House is just past the stop sign on the left.
featured_prop.Remarks: One of a kind! Located on the on the 8th Fairway of the Jones Course in serene Rancho La Quinta CC, this Hacienda II home provides gorgeous views of the Santa Rosa Mountains. Features include approx 3,400 sq ft, 4 bd, 4.5 ba, including a detached guest casita. Private entry courtyard and extended patio area that expands the outdoor living area, outdoor awning, upgraded stone style stamped decking, and resort style pebble tec pool & spa with beach entry. Other appointments include crown molding, granite wet bar with wine fridge, plantation shutters, built ins, gorgeous chef's kitchen with granite island, breakfast counter open to living space, custom backsplash, and stainless steel appliances. This is the perfect home for entertaining. Don't miss this stunning property!

featured_prop.DiningRoomDesc: Breakfast/Bar,Dining Area,Eat In Kitchen,Formal Dining Rm
featured_prop.Directions: Tomahawk and Mesa Grande
featured_prop.MiscString4: Golf Course View,Lake View,Panoramic View,Water View
featured_prop.Remarks: This is a rare find! Contemporary home complete with new designer furnishings highlighted with a new high end flawless gourmet kitchen with state of the art appliances with every feature you would dream of. The owners have created a new high end design with new flooring, distinct fireplace and open entertaining areas with a light and inviting feel as you enter each room. Enjoy the patio with private pool/spa & custom BBQ area from the living room, family room & kitchen. The south and west views are amazing with mountain and water views as you enjoy the sunsets from the 16th grove golf hole. Enter a lavish master suite which includes a luxurious bath separate tub & shower and large walk in closet. Guests have their own private suite and the cozy den/bedroom is perfect for enjoying some TV or relaxing after a busy day on the golf course. Indian Ridge has a wide range activities from tennis, workout facilities or clubhouse functions.

featured_prop.Directions: Main entrance to Bermuda Dunes CC 42nd/Adams. Adams pass the clubhouse to Kingston, turn left, to Ryan Way, turn left to Taylor Green turn left to Castle Harbour Estates Entrance. There is a gate code.
featured_prop.MiscString4: Golf Course View,Mountain View,Panoramic View,Pool View
featured_prop.Remarks: Welcome to Castle Harbour an exclusive enclave of custom homes in Bermuda Dunes Country Club. Masterful design and modern luxury are uniquely embodied in this custom one-of-a-kind residence built by the owner with no expense spared! Enter through an inviting gated courtyard, with private access to the 2-Room guest casita with kitchenette. Enjoy gatherings in the generously-sized great room graced by a fireplace, soaring wood ceiling,huge windows and glass sliding doors that disappear to allow the inside to flow outside,for entertaining at its best!The gourmet kitchen will inspire your inner chef with its stunning quartz counters, walk-in pantry, professional gas cooktop, double ovens,& wine refrig. The unique flow of this home allows each room access to another; all have sweeping views of the pool area and golf course. The divine master suite with Brazilian Wood Inlay behind the bed offers a fireplace,oversized closet & sliders to pool area. All this plus a 4-Car garage.

featured_prop.Directions: Jackson St. South past the polo fields to 53rd. Turn left. Farm is on your left on the corner of 53rd/Jackson.
featured_prop.Remarks: One of the BEST locations for a large farm, (approx. 77 acres), between La Quinta and Indio! The West side is elevated and offers spectacular Southern panoramic VIEWS to the Santa Rosa Mountains; what a setting for a custom home! The Farm is completely fenced with two gated entries; both off of Avenue 53. 27 gated pastures in total, 15 of them have Palapas for shade. There is a City Water Meter for domestic water, and CVWD for flood irrigation. Two lined reservoirs, are fed by irrigation lines, and stocked with fish! Electric meter on site. 3 mobile homes with 2 septic systems, an exercise track of approx. 7/8 miles with great footing and an irrigated grass field for stick-n-ball or jumps. Interior roads for easy access around the farm. Currently, a horse lay up facility, this is a a perfect location for your Equestrian business, OR just build the country estate of your dreams..like the Neighbor is doing currently! GREAT LOCATION down the street from City of La Quinta border.

featured_prop.Directions: South on HWY 111 to City of Indio turn right onto Doctor Carreon Blvd. turn right on Cheyenne Rd to JFK Court. Property will be on your right in less then 1/4 mile.
featured_prop.Remarks: Parcel #1 of four parcels, 3.98 acres, on and offsite improvements complete; approved for 45,000 sq. ft. medical use building; less then 1/4 mile from JFK Memorial Hospital.

featured_prop.Directions: South on HWY 111 to City of Indio, turn right onto Doctor Carreon Blvd. turn right on Cheyenne Rd to JFK Court. Property will be on your right in less then 1/4 mile.
featured_prop.Remarks: Parcel #2 of four parcels, 3.88 acres, on and offsite improvements complete; approved for 45,000 sq. ft. medical use building; less then 1/4 mile west of JFK Memorial Hospital

featured_prop.Directions: South on HWY 111 to City of Indio, turn right onto Doctor Carreon Blvd. turn right on Cheyenne Rd to JFK Court. Property will be on your right in less then 1/4 mile.
featured_prop.Remarks: Parcel #3 of four parcels, 3.84 acres, on and offsite improvements complete; approved for 45,000 sq. ft medical use building; less then 1/4 mile west of JFK Memorial Hospital.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to 52nd (east) to Madison gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Major price reduction on this beautiful one acre west facing prime lot at Madison Club! Incredible west and south mountain views looking down the 5th fairway of this premier Tom Fazio course. Ready for the home of your dreams at the Desert's exclusive golf club! Located on a very high end street with a private entrance...Financing terms available

featured_prop.Directions: Jefferson South through roundabout. The Hideaway entrance is on your left. Once through gate, turn right on Via Pessaro, left on Via Dona, left on Via Portofino. First large, south side lot on your left.
featured_prop.Remarks: One of the few remaining Interior, Estate sized, VIEW parcels, in The Hideaway Golf Club, La Quinta, Calif. Build your dream estate to capture the TRIFECTA of Lake to Fairway to mountain Scenery. Over 28,500 sf., with sweeping Southwestern orientation, this parcel is wonderfully quiet, and private, and also large enough to accommodate a large home. (Plans for a 10,000 sf home available with purchase.) Pie shaped with approx. 105 ft. of Southern View frontage, plus room for a circular driveway off the street. Golf Membership is available, but not required. Take the Virtual Tour to capture your imagination! Call me for your personal Tour today.

featured_prop.Directions: S. Palm Canyon to Sonora (opposite Stein Mart shopping center). Turn north on Sonora, then first right on Via Soledad.
featured_prop.Remarks: Hotel with over 10 Cap Rate! Pride of ownership is immediately evident in this very successful 19 room private men's hotel with the added income from a full luxury day-spa. The ambiance is one of peaceful comfort with the lovely rooms centered around 2 courtyards, each with their own pools, while 2 whrlpool spas are discretely tucked away in grottoes. Rooms range from 200-450 sq. ft., and several include sitting areas, living rooms, a full kitchen or a 2nd bedroom, to enhance the "like home" atmosphere. The Spa has a spacious check-in area, changing space, bathroom and 3 treatment rooms. Your guests will have plenty of parking in the 20 off street spaces. Walled and gated for privacy, this offering is the perfect blend of art and commerce.
